Rick Ross above Meek Mill Wale and special guest Machine Gun Kelly will perform at the Bryce Jordan Center on Nov PERIOD  PERIOD

Advertisement

What city you at big homie Rick Ross asks Meek Mill in the Ima Boss music video and at  p.m PERIOD Nov PERIOD  his answer will be State College PERIOD

The Bryce Jordan Center has just announced that Live Nation is bringing hip hop allstars Rick Ross Meek Mill Wale and special guest Machine Gun Kelly as part of The Maybach Music tour PERIOD

BJC Director of Sales and Marketing Bernie Punt said this is a new successful tour playing  shows across the country including venues at three Big  universities Penn State Ohio State and University of Illinois PERIOD

Some members of Maybach Music are returning to Penn State PERIOD Wale performed for a free Students Programming Association concert at Alumni Hall in the HUBRobeson Center last October and Rick Ross Opened for Lil Wayne at the BJC in Spring of  PERIOD

A University Park Allocation Committee student discount presale for tickets will be available this Thursday from noon to 6pm at the HUBRobeson Center BJC Eisenhower Auditorium and Penn State Downtown Theatre PERIOD

Prices for tickets range from . to . and will be available to the public this Friday 10am at the Bryce Jordan Center Eisenhower Auditorium Penn State Downtown Theatre  or online at www.bjc.psu.edu or ticketmaster.com
